mapper.insert: insert into members (member_email, member_pw, member_name, member_tel, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_postal, member_authority, member_enabled, hospital_code, doctor_room, member_image, member_gender, member_birth, joined_date, member_introduction, member_color) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberPostal}, #{memberAuthority}, #{memberEnabled}, #{hospitalCode}, #{doctorRoom}, #{memberImage}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirth}, #{joinedDate}, #{memberIntroduction}, #{memberColor})
mapper.select: select member_id, member_email, member_name, member_tel, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_authority, member_postal, member_image, member_birth, member_color, hospital_code from members where member_email = #{memberEmail} and hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}
select member_id, member_email, member_authority, hospital_code from members where member_email = #{memberEmail} and hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}

select member_id, member_email, member_name, member_tel, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_authority, member_postal, member_image, member_birth, member_introduction, member_color from members where hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}

select member_id, member_email, member_name, member_tel, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_authority, member_postal, member_image, member_birth, member_introduction, member_color from members where member_name like CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%') and hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}
select count(*) from members where member_name = #{memberName} and hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}
select count(*) from members where member_authority ='ROLE_DOCTOR' and hospital_code = #{hospitalCode}
mapper.update: update members set member_authority = #{memberAuthority}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, member_pw = #{memberPw}, member_tel = #{memberTel}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_postal = #{memberPostal}, member_addr1 = #{memberAddr1}, member_addr2 = #{memberAddr2}, member_image = #{memberImage}, member_introduction = #{memberIntroduction}, member_color = #{memberColor} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, doctor_room, hospital_code from members where hospital_code = #{hospitalCode} and member_authority = 'ROLE_DOCTOR'

select member_id, member_email, member_name, member_tel, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_authority, member_postal, member_image, member_birth, member_color, doctor_room from members where member_id = #{memberId}
